title: Hello Kitty: Ringo no Mori no Fantasy
original_name: ハローキティ りんごの森のファンタジー
sinopse: Kitty and Mimmy come upon the Apple Forest thanks to the help of a forest fairy. The fairy kingdom welcomes them as the "Twin Heroines" and ask that they save the princess. The key to the rescue is a golden apple and so the sisters' adventure beings.
